description: This source file defines REST API routes for managing notes in a notes application, including endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes. It uses Express routing and references a notes controller for handling logic.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines the route for creating a new note (POST /notes)

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines the route for retrieving all notes (GET /notes)

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines the route for retrieving a note by ID (GET /notes/:id)

methods.name: router.put
methods.description: Defines the route for updating a note by ID (PUT /notes/:id)

methods.name: router.delete
methods.description: Defines the route for deleting a note by ID (DELETE /notes/:id)
